participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Optimistic and creative, enjoys exploring new ideas through writing.
participant_1.background: I am most proud of my ability to remain positive in spite of my circumstances. I love to grow sunflowers. I wear my boots as little as possible. My favorite fiction genres are sci fi and horror. I can stay up late to watch my favorite TV shows.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and quirky, values family connections and enjoys a good story.
participant_2.background: I am a bit of an oddball, but I try to get along with my family. I like to travel. I have a law degree. I sometimes like to listen to music while I drive my old car. I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables.

content.text: Hi! What are you up to?
Hi! Just getting ready to head out the door to work. What about you?
Nothing much, just getting settled in after work.
What do you do for work?
I'm a writer.
Really? That's awesome! I love to read. What kind of things do you write?
Mostly sci-fi and horror.
Oh, that's cool! I'm more of a romance reader myself.
No problem! I know a lot of people like romance. What are some of your favorite authors?
I love Mary Balogh, Lisa Kleypas, and Sarah MacLean.
Oh, I've heard of those! I'll have to check them out.
You definitely should! They're all great authors.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! So, what's your favorite sci-fi or horror book?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think I'd have to say The Martian by Andy Weir.
Oh, I loved that book! It was so good!
Right? It was so well-written.
Yeah, it was. I really enjoyed it.
Me too! It's one of my favorites.
Well, I have to get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good day!
You too!
